hero.text: Our recipies are a of great quality, traditional pizza in modern form.

aboutRestaurant.text1: We invite you to the PIT STOP PIZZA pizzeria in Rzesz√≥w. Our specialty is, of course, PIZZA, which is prepared according to customer requirements from high-quality ingredients.
aboutRestaurant.text2: The dough to make it is made by excellent and trusted pizzaiolo. We would like everyone to find something special for themselves. That is why our offer is very varied, first of all, we focus on high quality services and affordable prices, and the priority task is full customer satisfaction.
aboutRestaurant.text3: Order processing time is important to us, so we do everything to deliver hot pizza to you quickly.
